alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 15 at 1:51PM AKST until February 17 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
